question: 用事
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>task</kanji> <kanji>action</kanji> is something you have to do (because <ja>事</ja> is all about actions). What's another way to say "an action that is a task," though? I would say <vocabulary>errand</vocabulary> or even <vocabulary>business</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
